meanings.definition: Having a wavy or rippling form
meanings.sent1: The undular pattern on the fabric made it look like gentle waves.
meanings.sent2: The undular road ahead seemed to sway in the wind.
meanings.sent3: The undular dance moves of the penguin brought smiles to everyone watching.
meanings.sent4: The undular music flowed through the room, creating a calming atmosphere.
meanings.sent5: The undular clouds in the sky resembled a painting come to life.

meanings.sent1: The undular snake slithered gracefully across the ground.
meanings.sent2: The undular motion of the ocean waves was mesmerizing to watch.
meanings.sent3: The undular branches of the tree swayed in the breeze like a dancer.
meanings.sent4: Her undular hair cascaded down her back like a waterfall.
meanings.sent5: The undular flag fluttered in the wind, creating a rhythmic movement.

meanings.sent1: The undular landscape of the desert stretched out endlessly before us.
meanings.sent2: The undular sound of the wind through the canyon echoed softly.
meanings.sent3: The undular pattern on the cake made it look like a delicious ocean wave.
meanings.sent4: His undular speech pattern was soothing to listen to.
meanings.sent5: The undular fields of wheat swayed in the breeze like a golden sea.
